summary: REQ-1 phone constants were updated in frontend/src/content/businessInfo.ts to display "(781) 227-0994" and tel "7812270994". However, based on the provided diff summary, it is not verifiable that all UI phone links now use these constants or that the old number string is fully removed across the frontend source/rendered pages. Additionally, the diff summary indicates an email update, which is explicitly a non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all rendered phone links across the site display "(781) 227-0994" and use href="tel:7812270994", and ensure the string "(844) 527-3733" does not appear anywhere in the frontend source or rendered pages.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows the updated centralized constants in businessInfo.ts. It does not include concrete code changes in components/pages where phone links/text are rendered, nor any evidence of a repo-wide replacement/removal of the old string.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/changed email address usage (e.g., contactMailto and/or centralized businessInfo email) despite email updates being a stated non-goal.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists updating the email address as a non-goal, but the diff summary states contactMailto now uses an updated email address and businessInfo.ts contains an email value.
